description: This file is the entry point for a React-based front-end application. It imports core React libraries, CSS styles, and the main App component, then renders the App component into the root DOM element within a strict mode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React node in the DOM for rendering React components.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root node.
